name: Balance of Emotions
description: This captivating artwork, titled 'Balance of Emotions,' depicts the intricate duality of human experience. The central figure, a serene yet empowered woman, balances masks of comedy and tragedy, symbolizing the fragility and resilience of our emotional states. The glowing orb at her base represents the core of life, while the vibrant hues of blue and red signify peace and passion, respectively. Created by Bibi in 2024, this piece invites viewers to reflect on the harmony between joy and sorrow in our lives.
